Prerequisites: PREREQUISITE: ACG 2011 AND ACG 2001 OR ACG 2021
Course Description:
MANAGERIAL ACCOUNTING FOCUSES ON THE
ACCOUNTING INFORMATION NEEDS OF THE VARIOUS
LEVELS OF INTERNAL MANAGEMENT WITHIN AN ORGANIZATION.
INTERNAL RESPONSIBILITY IS DIRECTED AT
THREE MAJOR AREAS OF MANAGEMENT RESPONSIBILITY:
COST DETERMINATION, PLANNING AND CONTROL,
AND LONG-TERM DECISION-MAKING.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
